description:
ALERT: DONT BUY ME IF YOU HAVE NO INSTAGRAM ACCOUNT!!!

try instagrio lite fist, this is the paid version

instagram viewer for webOS
---------------------
Tips:
Long click on picture to do like save or comment!
Do not ask me question on review, tweet @instagrio please, or mail to instagrio@tsung.bz 
---------------------
v0.1.14
*load more at bottom
*login bug fix
---------------------
v0.1.13
*add video play support
---------------------
v0.1.12
*fix login issue
*fix empty loading after login issue
---------------------
v0.1.11
*show emoji on location area
*fix menu bug pop from sub view
---------------------
v0.1.9
*support emoji! yap, that's beautiful
---------------------
v0.1.8
*log out
*background bug fix: search user with just type while photo gallery.
---------------------
v0.1.7
*1.4.5 photo save bug!
---------------------
v0.1.6
*new logo!
---------------------
v0.1.5
*shameful for the bug of comment! sorry!
---------------------
v0.1.4
*performance improment
*pre3 exhibition mode bug fix
---------------------
v0.1.3
*type to search user
--webOS2.X features:
*just type to search user
*exhibition mode(this is cool!)
---------------------
v0.1.1
*view following and followed
---------------------
v0.1.0
*view like and comment post immediately on list.
*hold too long show gallery bug fix.
*view photo title
---------------------
v0.0.9
*Pre3 photo size bug fix
*path style menu
*pop to home quickly with new menu
---------------------

features:
*view feed/popular/self/liked photo list
*view special user photo list
*follow/request/unfollow user
*gallery mode
*show like list
*show comment list
*show photos of nearby location
*hold to comment or like or save photo
*geasture to hide or show menu

feedback: @instagrio on twitter thanks
